Project Name :

Social Network Using Laravel 5.3 and Vuejs 2.0

Project Description :

build a complete application with the Laravel 5.3 and Vuejs 2.0
  • set up the default authentication and modified it to fit my needs
  • display the user's profile, and also display user img from Laravel's local storage
  • create a profiles table and setup relationships between the users table and the profiles table
  • make sure every time a new user is created, a profile is automatically created for that user
  • created a form for updating user profiles
  • updated user's profile, uploading the img to laravel's default storage
  • display the user's profile information on the profiles page
  • implemented noty notifications with my application
  • created a friendships table, and model with a trait to help me implement friendships
  • implemented the add_friend and accept_friend methods for friendships functionality
  • implemented a method to get all the friends for this user
  • implemented a method to get all the pending friendship requests for a user , and also check if a user is friends with another
  • created a Friend vue component, and as soon as it is mounted, it send ajax request to laravel, to get the relationship status for two users
  • set up Friendships Controller and checked relaitonship status using vue resource. We specified the state of my component depending on the response from my controller
  • used the response from the ajax request to display the appropriate data concerning relationship status on my profile page
  • sent an ajax request to laravel, added a friend, and with vue js , updated my view accordingly
  • use vuejs to accept friendships for my application
  • used noty to display a notification to my user when a friend request is sent or accepted
  • set up mailtrap, pusher and database for laravel 5.3 notifications
  • used laravel echo to listen to application notifications broadcast to me
  • sent out notifications in laravel 5.3 to all channels
  • created a new notification to accept friend requests
  • implemented laravel 5.3 queues for notifications
  • installed a notification sound for my app notifications
  • installed vuex into my application
  • created an unreadNotifications component
  • craeted a posts table and migration, and a vue component for creating posts
  • created posts in vuejs component, using data bindings too
  • saved posts into database using laravel and vuejs component
  • created a new feed.vue component
  • created an end point that returns the feed of a user
  • displayed the news feed using the data from my database
  • displayed user data and timestamps for each post in the feed
  • make method in vuejs to like posts in real time
  • make method to unlike posts in my vue component
  • sort feed array using a built in php function (usort)
  • seeder for my user's table in preparation for my search with laravel scout
  • install laravel scout and imported data into algolia
  • algolia js client and used it with vuejs to search for users
  • formatting search results in a better way
Github
Github

Project Description :

build a complete Blog with the Laravel 5.3

  • Saving posts and featured image upload
  • Soft deletes table setup
  • Seeding default Administrator
  • Setting session information
  • Soft deleting _ Trashing posts , Retrieving trashed posts , Permanently deleting posts , Restoring trashed posts
  • Updating posts
  • Tags Ceate,Restore,Update,Delete (CRUD)
  • Creating users , Creating profiles for users
  • Editing , Update user profile
  • WYSIWYG installation_ summernote
  • Blog site settings
  • install Disqus
  • Searching posts
  • AddThis installation into Blog
  • Mailchimp installation
